resources.string: This app stimulates the auricular branch of the vagus nerve to activate the parasympathetic nervous system.
- Tingling or numbness (common) - Skin irritation (occasional) - Mild dizziness (occasional) - Drowsiness (occasional) - Headache (rare) - Nausea (rare)
⚠️ Prolonged continuous vibration may cause your device to heat up. Avoid using Continuous mode for extended periods.
Use at your own risk. No liability for use.

Instructions: 1. Tap a vibration mode to start. 2. Place the bottom-right corner of your phone directly on the marked point inside your left ear (cymba conchae). Hold gently for the duration of the stimulation. 3. Optional: to maximize vagus stimulation use breathing technique: 4 seconds inhale, 6 seconds exhale. Instruction audio is available (checkbox).
